channel.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, So I recently started adding quests to my server and everytime I use the ::npc command it spams this error in the CMD.
[code=robots][ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION [ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION Error loading map region: 12688 Error loading map region: 12689 [Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS [26/07/12 21:35]: Launching Zedidious [26/07/12 21:35]: Banning ip:.* [26/07/12 21:35]: Banning ip:.*.* Jul 26, 2012 9:35:57 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 26, 2012 9:35:57 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Setting up login channels... Jul 26, 2012 9:35:57 PM server.RS2Server start INFO: Zedidious server ready [26/07/12 21:35]: Starting with loading Target Slots [26/07/12 21:35]: loading item names.. [26/07/12 21:35]: System resources cleaned [26/07/12 21:35]: Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594 [26/07/12 21:36]: [REGISTERED]: Joker [26/07/12 21:36]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 75 [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHa ndler.java:260) [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.model.players.Client.update(Client.java:476) [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:206) [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.Server$2.execute(Server.java:150) [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.GameEngine$1.run(GameEngine.java:104) [26/07/12 21:36]: at server.GameEngine$5.run(GameEngine.java:177) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(U nknown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.access$201(Unknown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unk nown Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Un known Source) [26/07/12 21:36]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
This is the same when I use my ::spawn command which automatically writes the line in spawn-config.
Any reason why this is happening? It didn't happen before I added a quest.
Thanks, RS PS

item.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @runeherorsps runeherorsps
item.description:
@runeherorsps wrote:

obviously, the error appears when you use the “spawn” command.
Which writes a new line in your spawn-config or whatever, but writes it wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

The spawn command is fine as well, I don’t think it is the commands, They were working before I added custom quests.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]

item.description:
@runeherorsps wrote:

post that “spawn” command.
The NPC command is right

item.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

[code=java] if(playerCommand.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
if(newNPC > 0) {
Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 120, 7, 70, 70, false, false);
c.sendMessage(“You spawn a Npc.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}			
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC/Spawn Command [HELP]
